Package io.micronaut.views.fields

package io.micronaut.views.fields
Classes related to the generation of HTML Fieldset representations for a given Java class.
Since:
4.1.0
Author:
Sergio del Amo
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    io.micronaut.views
    Contains classes specific to Views within Micronaut.
    io.micronaut.views.fields.annotations
    Annotations for HTML Form Elements.
    io.micronaut.views.fields.constraints
    Custom Constraints for validating HTML Forms.
    io.micronaut.views.fields.elements
    These classes are implementations of FormElement.
    io.micronaut.views.fields.fetchers
    API to fetch elements for option, radio buttons and checkboxes.
    io.micronaut.views.fields.formelementresolvers
    Defines an API to resolve a Form Element class given a bean property.
    io.micronaut.views.fields.messages
     
    io.micronaut.views.fields.render
    Utility classes to render form elements.
    io.micronaut.views.fields.tck
    Technology Compatibility Kit for Fields generation.
  • Class
    Description
    DefaultFieldGenerator
    Default implementation of FieldsetGenerator which relies on the types being introspected.
    DefaultFormGenerator
    DefaultImplementation of FormGenerator.
    Fieldset
    Represents an HTML fieldset.
    FieldsetGenerator
    API to generate an HTML Fieldset representation of a give type or instance.
    Form
    Representation of an HTML form.
    FormElement
    Marker interface for HTML Form Elements.
    FormGenerator
    Generates a Form for a given type representing a form class.
    HtmlAttribute
    Represents an HTML Attribute.
    HtmlTag
    Constants for HTML Tags.
    InputType
    Constants for the value of the type attribute in an HTML input tag.
